description: Business feature map for Vibeman - AI-powered project management and codebase analysis platform. Each context represents a user capability with all implementation layers bundled.

contexts.title: Blueprint Scanning UI & Controls
contexts.summary: Run codebase scans from the blueprint interface. Select scan types, configure options, view progress bars, and handle scan errors. Main entry point for all scanning operations.

contexts.title: Blueprint Context & File Selection
contexts.summary: Select which contexts and files to include in scans. Batch selection modal, file grid, and context selector for targeted scanning operations.

contexts.title: Blueprint Framework Adapters
contexts.summary: Framework-specific scan adapters for Next.js, Express, FastAPI, Django, and generic backends. Each adapter knows how to scan its framework's structure, build, and contexts.

contexts.title: Blueprint Core Scan Types
contexts.summary: Execute core scan types: structure, build, contexts, vision, and unused file detection. Handles scan execution, prompts, and result processing.

contexts.title: Blueprint Context-Aware Scans
contexts.summary: Run specialized scans per context: photo scanning, test design, code review, separator analysis, and structure scans. AI-powered analysis of specific code areas.

contexts.title: Blueprint Workers & Scheduler
contexts.summary: Background workers for parallel scan execution. Manage worker threads, schedule scans, track history, and predict scan durations.

contexts.title: Blueprint State Machine
contexts.summary: Configure and run automated scan pipelines using state machines. Define scan sequences, decision points, and conditional flows for complex scanning operations.

contexts.title: Getting Started & Onboarding Flow
contexts.summary: Guide new users through initial project setup. Control panel with task items, getting started panels, and onboarding state management.

contexts.title: Goal Drawer & Quick Add
contexts.summary: Quickly add and manage goals from the sidebar drawer. Streamlined goal creation flow integrated with the onboarding experience.

contexts.title: Context Cards & Layout
contexts.summary: Browse and manage code contexts as visual cards. Main context layout with card grid, context menu, and basic CRUD operations.

contexts.title: Context Groups & Organization
contexts.summary: Organize contexts into color-coded groups. Create sections, manage group hierarchy, drag-and-drop reordering, and gradient color picker.

contexts.title: Context Detail & File Viewer
contexts.summary: View detailed context information including files, timeline, and related contexts. File modal for code preview and context file management.

contexts.title: Context AI Generation
contexts.summary: Generate context descriptions and metadata using AI. Form for context creation, file selection, and AI-powered description generation.

contexts.title: Context Preview & Testing
contexts.summary: Preview context coverage with image paths and test scenarios. Test scenario editor, selector APIs, and context target popup for validation.

contexts.title: Ideas Scanning & Setup
contexts.summary: Configure and initiate idea generation scans. Select scan types, choose LLM provider, edit prompts, and filter by project/context.

contexts.title: Ideas Browse & Filter
contexts.summary: Browse generated ideas with filtering and detail views. Filter by context, project, status. View idea details in modal with full information.

contexts.title: Ideas Tinder Evaluation
contexts.summary: Swipe-based idea evaluation interface. Review ideas with card UI, accept/reject controls, and LLM-powered evaluation suggestions.

contexts.title: Ideas Lifecycle & Buffer
contexts.summary: Track idea progress through lifecycle phases. Kanban-style buffer view for idea management with columns, timeline, and phase configuration.

contexts.title: Refactor Wizard Steps
contexts.summary: Multi-step refactoring wizard with scan, review, plan, package, settings, and execute phases. Progress tracking and step navigation.

contexts.title: Refactor Opportunities & Packages
contexts.summary: Identify refactoring opportunities and package them into actionable items. Opportunity cards, package cards, and suggestion integration.

contexts.title: Refactor DSL Builder
contexts.summary: Build and execute refactoring operations using a domain-specific language. Template selector, execution config, and DSL validation.

contexts.title: Refactor AI Analysis
contexts.summary: AI-powered code analysis for refactoring suggestions. Strategic requirement generation and automated analysis of codebase patterns.

contexts.title: Refactor Results & History
contexts.summary: View refactoring results and execution history. Results dashboard, detailed result views, and historical comparison.

contexts.title: Annette Voice Assistant Core
contexts.summary: Voice-powered AI assistant for project guidance. Audio handling, session management, response caching, and TTS generation.

contexts.title: Annette Insights & Knowledge
contexts.summary: AI-powered insights panel with knowledge sources, live event ticker, and context HUD. Scan briefing and analytics services.

contexts.title: Annette AI Tools
contexts.summary: AI tool integrations for the voice assistant. Event listener, goal evaluator, implementation log, and file operation tools.

contexts.title: Task Runner Batch Execution
contexts.summary: Execute batches of tasks with progress tracking. Task columns, items, dual batch panel, and remote batch display for distributed execution.

contexts.title: Task Runner Git & Screenshots
contexts.summary: Git control integration and screenshot capture for task execution. Configuration toolbars and execution prompt editing.

contexts.title: Manager Goal Hub
contexts.summary: Goal management dashboard with list, detail panels, and progress tracking. Create goals, track hypotheses, and view activity feed.

contexts.title: Manager Hypothesis Tracking
contexts.summary: Track and validate hypotheses related to goals. Hypothesis cards, tracker panel, and modal for creating new hypotheses.

contexts.title: Manager Implementation Logs
contexts.summary: Track implementation progress with logs and system map. Log cards, detail views, and proposal bridge for connecting ideas to implementations.

contexts.title: Manager Standup Wizard
contexts.summary: Daily standup workflow with project review, goal updates, and automation controls. Stepper navigation through standup phases.

contexts.title: Manager Standup Automation
contexts.summary: Automated standup execution with server control, session dashboard, and candidate selection. Run standups with AI assistance.

contexts.title: Social Kanban Board
contexts.summary: Kanban board for managing social communications. Columns, cards, drag-and-drop, and stats bar for tracking feedback items.

contexts.title: Social Card Content Types
contexts.summary: Different card content types for various social channels: chat, email, Facebook, Instagram, reviews, and X/Twitter.

contexts.title: Social Activity & Filters
contexts.summary: Activity tracking and filtering for social items. Filter bar, SLA badges, swimlanes view, and split-view panel for detailed review.

contexts.title: Social State Management
contexts.summary: State providers for social features: drag state, selection state, view mode. Centralized state management for kanban interactions.

contexts.title: Social Discovery (Twitter/X)
contexts.summary: Discover and import tweets for review. Search configuration, tweet result cards, and selection panel for importing social content.

contexts.title: Social Channel Configuration
contexts.summary: Configure social channel integrations. Channel icons, configuration forms, and encrypted credential storage for social APIs.

contexts.title: Reflector Dashboard & Filters
contexts.summary: Ideas analysis dashboard with filtering by status, date range, context, and project. View tabs and active filter display.

contexts.title: Reflector Analytics & Insights
contexts.summary: Reflection analytics with executive summary, effort/impact matrix, KPI cards, and AI-generated insights for decision making.

contexts.title: Reflector Views (Weekly & Constellation)
contexts.summary: Specialized reflector views: constellation for project relationships, weekly dashboard with daily activity and specialist breakdowns.

contexts.title: Docs Architecture Analysis
contexts.summary: Architecture documentation with system maps, module explorer, and navigation. Visualize codebase structure and module relationships.

contexts.title: Docs Impact Simulator & X-Ray
contexts.summary: Simulate code change impacts and visualize hot paths. Impact analysis panel, simulation mode, and X-Ray visualization for critical paths.

contexts.title: Tech Debt Radar & Scanning
contexts.summary: Track and visualize technical debt. Radar visualization, debt cards, detail modals, and plugin-based scanning for different debt types.

contexts.title: Debt Prediction & ROI Simulator
contexts.summary: Predictive debt analysis and ROI simulation. Opportunity cards, health gauges, prediction lists, and ROI calculation for refactoring decisions.

contexts.title: Claude Code Requirements
contexts.summary: Manage Claude Code requirements for AI-assisted development. Requirement list, detail views, run controls, and batch processing.

contexts.title: Claude Code Execution
contexts.summary: Execute Claude Code requirements with queue management. Execution manager, folder management, log tracking, and context auto-update.

contexts.title: Goals Management
contexts.summary: Core goals CRUD with modals, forms, and screen catalog. Create, edit, and track goals with implementation log integration.

contexts.title: Code Tree Navigation
contexts.summary: File tree navigation with search and code preview. Tree view, search input, suggestions dropdown, and code preview modal.

contexts.title: Dependencies Management
contexts.summary: Scan and manage project dependencies. Column view, security pipeline, direct upgrades, and PR automation for package updates.

contexts.title: Autonomous CI/CD
contexts.summary: Continuous integration dashboard with pipeline management. Build status, history, predictions, and flaky test detection.

contexts.title: Project Health & Security
contexts.summary: Project health dashboard with security intelligence. Health score gauges, trend charts, vulnerability breakdown, and risk scoring.

contexts.title: Architecture Evolution
contexts.summary: Track architecture changes with graph visualization. Drift detection, node details, and AI-powered architecture suggestions.

contexts.title: Blueprint Composer
contexts.summary: Compose automated scan pipelines visually. Chain builder, component selection, conditional branches, and trigger configuration.

contexts.title: Marketplace & Patterns
contexts.summary: Browse and share code patterns. Pattern cards, detail views, favorites, and community recommendations for reusable solutions.

contexts.title: Proposals Workflow
contexts.summary: Manage implementation proposals. Proposal cards with headers, content, and action buttons for approval workflow.

contexts.title: Strategic Roadmap
contexts.summary: Plan and visualize project roadmap. Timeline visualization, initiative panels, and roadmap headers for strategic planning.

contexts.title: Onboarding Accelerator
contexts.summary: Learning paths for team onboarding. Module cards, quiz panels, code walkthrough viewer, and path creation for structured learning.

contexts.title: Hall of Fame
contexts.summary: Celebrate implemented ideas and achievements. Gallery view, achievement cards, and statistics for team motivation.

contexts.title: Observatory & Monitoring
contexts.summary: Monitor project metrics and events. Real-time dashboard, event timeline, and metric visualizations for project health tracking.

contexts.title: Questions & Clarification
contexts.summary: Generate and manage clarifying questions. Question cards, context-aware prompts, and answer collection for better understanding.

contexts.title: LLM Provider Integration
contexts.summary: Multi-provider LLM integration: OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini, Ollama. Provider selector, token tracking, and unified API interface.

contexts.title: Database Layer
contexts.summary: Database connection and drivers. SQLite driver, migrations, and connection management for data persistence.

contexts.title: File System Operations
contexts.summary: File system interface for reading, writing, and watching files. Git manager, dependency scanner, and process management.

contexts.title: Project Management
contexts.summary: Project CRUD and synchronization. Project stores, configuration, and real-time updates across the application.

contexts.title: API Utilities & Helpers
contexts.summary: Common API utilities: error handling, JSON parsing, logging, and configuration. Shared helpers across all API routes.

contexts.title: UI State Stores
contexts.summary: Zustand stores for UI state: themes, tooltips, badges, focus mode, and decision queue. Cross-cutting UI concerns.

summary.overview: Vibeman is an AI-driven development platform that automates the software development lifecycle. Users can analyze codebases (Blueprint), generate improvement ideas with 12 specialized AI agents (Ideas), batch-execute code changes (TaskRunner), track goals and implementations (Manager), manage code contexts visually (Context), and orchestrate refactoring at scale (RefactorWizard). The platform integrates multiple LLM providers and Claude Code for autonomous code execution.

interconnections.description: Onboarding guides users to run initial blueprint scans to understand their codebase
Scan UI selects appropriate framework adapter (Next.js, FastAPI, etc.) for codebase analysis
Framework adapters invoke core scan types (structure, build, contexts) for analysis
Completed scans generate contexts that appear in the context management interface
Selected contexts are passed to specialized context-aware scans for deeper analysis
State machine orchestrates worker execution for parallel scan pipelines
Context cards are organized into color-coded groups for visual management
Clicking a context card opens detailed view with files, timeline, and related contexts
Creating new contexts invokes AI to generate descriptions and metadata
Idea scans use configured LLM providers to generate improvement suggestions
Completed idea scans populate the browsable ideas list
User can switch to tinder-style evaluation for rapid idea review
Accepted ideas move to lifecycle buffer for implementation tracking
Buffered ideas become executable tasks in the task runner
Task runner invokes Claude Code to execute requirements autonomously
Task execution can automatically create git commits and branches
After code changes, context auto-update refreshes affected contexts
Wizard scans identify refactoring opportunities grouped into packages
AI analyzer provides strategic recommendations for refactoring packages
AI recommendations feed into DSL-based refactoring execution
DSL-defined refactoring operations become executable tasks
Goals contain hypotheses that need validation through implementation
Goal progress is tracked through implementation log entries
Standup wizard can be automated with AI assistance
Voice assistant uses AI tools for goal evaluation and file operations
Voice queries surface insights and knowledge from project context
Kanban cards render different content types for each social channel
Kanban board can be filtered by activity, SLA, and status
Discovered tweets are imported into the kanban board for review
Filtered ideas are analyzed to generate executive insights
Different view modes visualize idea data in constellation or weekly formats
Architecture graph enables impact simulation and hot path analysis
Detected tech debt feeds into ROI simulation for prioritization
Visual composer creates state machine configurations for scan pipelines
Core goals CRUD feeds into the goal hub dashboard

userJourneys.name: New Project Analysis
userJourneys.description: User onboards a new project and runs initial codebase analysis

steps.action: Add a new project by selecting its path
Follow the getting started checklist
Run structure and context scans
Review generated contexts and organize into groups
Refine context descriptions with AI assistance

userJourneys.name: Idea-Driven Development
userJourneys.description: User generates ideas, reviews them, and executes accepted improvements

steps.action: Configure and run idea generation scans
Browse generated ideas by context and type
Swipe through ideas to accept or reject
Review accepted ideas in the buffer
Execute accepted ideas as batch tasks
Monitor Claude Code executing requirements

userJourneys.name: Strategic Refactoring
userJourneys.description: User identifies refactoring opportunities and executes them systematically

steps.action: Start the refactor wizard and run analysis
Review identified opportunities grouped into packages
Get AI recommendations for prioritization
Configure refactoring operations with DSL
Execute refactoring tasks in batches
Review execution results and history

userJourneys.name: Goal Tracking & Standup
userJourneys.description: User tracks development goals and runs daily standups

steps.action: Create or select an active goal
Define hypotheses to validate
Run daily standup workflow
Review implementation progress
Celebrate completed implementations

sharedDependencies.purpose: Unified LLM integration layer - all AI features route through here for consistent token tracking, provider switching, and cost monitoring across OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini, and Ollama
SQLite database with WAL mode and migrations - provides persistence for all entities (contexts, ideas, goals, scans, tech debt) with driver abstraction for future PostgreSQL support
Active project state and configuration - all project-scoped features depend on knowing which project is currently selected and its path
File system interface with git integration - handles file reading/writing, watching, and version control operations for code analysis and modification
Common API helpers for error handling, JSON parsing, logging, and configuration - ensures consistent error responses and logging across 158+ API endpoints
Cross-cutting UI state (theme, tooltips, focus mode, decision queue) - Zustand stores that provide consistent UX behavior across all feature modules
